caller_intent: Todd Fry from Haker Construction is asking whether a builder's risk policy covers theft or vandalism of materials on a construction site, specifically for a subcontractor's $1.2 million pre-engineered metal building project in Monroe, NC.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed builder's risk policies typically include theft/vandalism coverage as a standard provision.
Agent requested clarification on material value estimates (75% of $1.2M job) and project location (Monroe, NC).
Agent offered to verify policy specifics and ensure adequate coverage for the subcontractor's materials.
knowledge_required: Coverage for theft/vandalism of construction materials
Assessing material value estimates for insurance purposes
summary: Todd Fry inquired about builder's risk coverage for theft/vandalism on a construction project in Monroe, NC. The agent confirmed standard coverage but needed details about material value and location to verify policy specifics. The call ended with a commitment to follow up after reviewing the policy.
